title: HOUR 2- Tom Verducci Oct 16, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Tom Verducci Oct 16, 2020
description:
Tom Verducci tells Dan that he has not given up on the Dodgers although they have a huge mountain to climb. Tom says that Dave Robert's job is secure and that he will be back with the Dodgers next season even with no World Series win.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
